text: Kamatɨhu Jisas nurɨŋ tɨhi kuyu sambɨ ambavarata, nɨmavami, Indarɨmara. Kru mumɨŋga wit kɨrɨs kɨvayɨ sisɨvɨrɨman vata umi.13.3 Matyundu aŋgwɨmɨkɨyɨ kuyu kutaŋguta kumanzɨpi timu tɨŋgɨruramata ambavarami hañɨndu muhanda nɨ. Kuyu kanɨŋandɨhin 13.3yɨ kɨta uta 52yɨ tɨhi kuyu sambɨ Gotɨndu tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨhɨyɨrɨm ambami.
